conbody.p: In the Qualifications and Benefits page, you can view the following four icons to perform different actions:

ul.li:
Add Product: Search and select products or product categories (multi-select) from the Product Catalog window. If either AND / OR (OOTB expression) is selected and you can add or remove qualification row, then the expression automatically updated by either adding the new qualification product or by removing the product. You can perform the following selections:
Qualification Products
Benefit Products
Individual Products
Product Category
Custom Product Group
Once products are added to a program, you can update the program in Draft or Amendment statuses.
To edit a product selection, click by the product name.
Export: You can export qualification and benefit information

Delete: You can delete any of the following items:
Products
Category
Sub-Category

conbody.p: You can independently set multiple revenue targets across products in a Reward Saving Program. If multiple criteria (rows) are used, then each row must be contained in the expression criteria. Following expressions are available for qualifications and benefits:

You can combine the qualifications by the expression OR or AND, and the expression Custom is editable for users. When you select any one of the expressions, the expression builder automatically populates with formula displaying how all qualifications products need to be evaluated. Benefits are always combined in an AND clause. So all benefits listed in a particular section are given as long as the qualification criteria are fulfilled.
You can define the expression, for example:

ul.li: Q1 AND Q2 (If both Q1 and Q2 met the qualification give B1)
Q1 AND Q2 (If both Q1 and Q2 met the qualification give both B1 and B2)
Q1 OR Q2 (If Q1 or Q2 met the qualification give both B1 and B2)
Q1 AND Q2 AND Q3 (If Q1 and Q2 and Q3 met the qualification give both B1 and B2)
Q1 OR Q2 AND Q3 (If either Q1 OR Q2 met, then check for Q3, If Q3 also met the qualification give both B1 and B2)
